title: MAP Memory and Place Attract Loop
creator_contributor_role: Rob Salvatore, composition and sound design
abstract: 31 second attract loop for MAP project
description: This 31 second attract loop for MAP project was an ACMI in-house production designed and animated by Motion Graphics designer Shaun Yue from a brief by MAP interactive designer Natasha Dwyer and uses composition and sound design by Roberto Salvatore.
